name: Deep Dark Fantasies
description:
Learn the story of an asian man Van Harkholme who became The Master. The Dungeon Master.
Van moved to the USA from Vietnam because the people of his country treated such men like Van very unworthily. He dreamt to be an actor but life was a strange thing to him he began his acting… as a porn actor…
Love and hate, good and evil intentions all collided in this story. Get into the epicentre of The Master and slaves relationship.
Features:
-A brand-new unforgettable story
-Hard moral choice
-A special graphics style not common for visual novels
-Several different endings
